name: Love Organization
description:
Love Organization is an interactive fiction about saving your kidnapped girlfriend. The Organization is a “company” you were involve with. After leaving that life behind to pursue the love of your life, you are sucked back in with a race against time to prove yourself worthy of the freedom you have obtained by leaving it all behind. The game relies on pristine memory and basic directional knowledge to complete. Will you save her? Or will you die in the process? 

Created by: Kyrah Gayle
